title: Game of Love: (Book #1)
description: What happens when the price of love is too much to pay?After a public scandal and the worst loss of her career, tennis champion Gemma Lennon can’t afford to fall for Andre Reyes. He’s everything she wants at the worst time, and the paparazzi have never been more persistent in their pursuit of capturing another scandal involving her.Gemma needs to keep her eyes on the winning a grand slam. But how can she say no to the only person who gets her and her world.Gemma must risk everything for a man who may be the one...or break her own heart to claim the glory she’s always craved.Fans of the movie Notting Hill and Wimbledon are falling in love with Game of Love, a second chance romance from Ara Grigorian.Scroll up and 1-click to start reading this drama-packed contemporary sports romance today! Discover the novel that won "Outstanding Romance - IAN Book of the Year" & "Readers' Favorite - International Book Award Gold Winner"
author: Ara Grigorian
